videos.title: how to make the best language learning plan

comments.text: I haven't watched the video yet, but I swear you've been one of my biggest motivations to keep learning a new language. there are days when it feels like I'm going to give up and it's not worth it to keep trying, but then I watch some video of your channel and it seems like I've got my head in the right place. thank you anna!! kisses from brazil (by the way, my name is also ana ðŸ¤ )
comments.name: Laura

comments.text: Thank you so much for creating this template. At first, I wasn't sure how this would help me. I'm only learning one language, but then I decide to use the 'Time Distribution' for the different skills (reading, listening, speaking,...) instead of languages and a whole new world opened up. It's so much fun to see how much time I can realistically spend on language learning and plan my week based on the info in that timetable.
comments.name: Alex

comments.text: don't know if you know what you've just done here but this is GENIUS! The best part is I can personalize this template for not just language learning, but for all my learning. From instruments to coding (languages too) to school/course subjects...Thank you so so much!
comments.name: Petr
